name: slow-motion

name: time-lapse

negative_prompt: regular speed, static scenes, single moment

name: particle-fx

negative_prompt: clean air, no particles, clear atmosphere

negative_prompt: single exposure, clear image, solid composition

negative_prompt: static image, sharp details, frozen motion
